text: The Babysitter is an American melodrama and erotic thriller movie from 1995. It is about a teenage babysitter who is fantasized about by several people. Her name, Jennifer, is revealed 83 minutes into the movie. Alicia Silverstone plays Jennifer. This movie was released on October 17, 1995. Reviews were very negative. Paramount Pictures released this movie in the United States. title: The Babysitter
